casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. KERR
v.
REGER 2018-1063 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Prohibition. On motion to dismiss complaint. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Motion to have relator declared a vexatious litigator denied. O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, and French, JJ., concur. Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur in granting the motion to dismiss and would also grant the motion to have relator declared a vexatious litigator.
